name: Necro Vita
description:
You are Ducillian, a great (or despicable, depending on who you ask) Necromancer from the city of Shak’tur. 

Your city has fallen victim to a brutal invasion, and you must seek help from the Nilaash, amazing undefeated warriors that answer only to the call of those who need them most. You must find them, for they are the only hope for Shak’tur, it won’t be easy though, the world has little trust for Necromancers.

Features:

•Linear level design

•Minor exploration

•Fast paced combat

•32-bit art design

•Epic music

Controls:

W - Move Up

S - Move Down

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Left Click - Shoot NecroBall

Credits:

Developer - Matthew Roseblade

Game Artist - Matthew Roseblade

Music Artist - Kevin Mcleod
